# cdnetworks_iam_users (Data Source)
Use this data source to query user sub account list.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "cdnetworks_iam_users" "user_list" {
  page_size     = 1
  page_number   = 1
}
 
output "user_list" {
  value = data.cdnetworks_iam_users.user_list
}
```
